page.title: 20SEALS IN EDAY
page.content: You may find seals on the shore at any time of year but more especially in October when they up to have their young. The grey seals are roughly 1.5m in length. Their habitat is either an offshore sandbank or some low tidal rocks. You will be almost sure to find seals on Sealskerry where they lie in the sun and can be heard calling to one another from a fair distance away. For some years the seal pups were hunted for their fur in an annual seal cull but for the last two or three years this has not been happening. The fishermen now complain that the number of seals is on the increase and they eating up all the stocks of fish.
